content:
As promised in yesteday's call - I'm sharing a link to the draft codelab exercise, which I think will be useful for both client and server implementers.
https://barabo.github.io/demo-patient-lists

The final section of the codelab is where I'm keeping meta TODO issues (for now). Feel free to provide feedback either here or in the github issues, which you can get to by clicking the 'Report a mistake' link in the lower left corner of each section.
